data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today have:

1. Approved the standalone and consolidated audited financial results of the Company for the quarter/year ended 31st March, 2022 (Enclosed)
2. Recommended a dividend of 100% i.e Rs. 10/- per equity share of Rs. 10/- each for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
